titleStmt.title: The resolutions of the army, against the King, kingdome and city. Iuly 15. 1648. at 8 of the clocke in the morning.
titleStmt.author: Croplie, Thomas.
Hide, Richard.

notesStmt.note: Signed at end: Testified by Thomas Croplie. Richard Hide.
Sometimes incorrectly attributed to John Dias.
Identified on UMI microfilm reel 1775 as Wing D1380A.
Reproductions of the originals in the British Library (Thomason Tracts) and the Harvard University Library (Early English Books).
